definition: the successful completion of a program of study
details:
noun
- the successful completion of a program of study
- the act of arranging in grades
= synonyms: gradation
- a line (as on a vessel or ruler) that marks a measurement
= example: a line (as on a vessel or ruler) that marks a measurement
- an academic exercise in which diplomas are conferred
= synonyms: commencement, commencement exercise, commencement ceremony, graduation exercise
